lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin was injured during his first N.H.L. exhibition game last night when he collided with his Pittsburgh teammate John LeClair early in the second period against Philadelphia. Malkin, a rookie Russian center, was taken to a hospital for further evaluation, the team announced. Mark Recchi, a veteran winger for the Penguins, also was sent to a hospital after he was hit with a high stick in the first period.
